review: **** **** ****** *** examines patients in very detailed way. Have lot of patience and listens to all your problems carefully. Provides best treatment. Also easily reachable any time in case of any emergency care/suggestions needed.

Dr. Pratima hears the problem patiently and examines the child with patience. The medicines worked for my son.
Even she is helping me to cover up the missing vaccines

I have received very fast replies in the chat window as well

One of the best pediatric  doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
To start with clinic premises are clean and very hygiene.
Doctor is very patient and listened to us and explained us in detail.
She is very friendly with the kid and helped him feel comfortable.

**** **** ******, detailed examination of baby no rush and she takes time to explain each and everything in detail.Very professional and caring and proactive intimation for follow-up checkups.Highly recommended..
Very friendly and explains the issue very clearly.She do very good follow-up during the course and also suggests what is good for kids.
Dr Prathima was very friendly and experienced. I found the clinic neat and well established. My experience was pleasant
Definitely recommend Dr Prathima Verma, i appreciate her patience with which she handled my child. Appointment was on dot without delay.

Dr.Pratima is very friendly and she gave good treatment plan and reassurance to my neice who was the patient. She listened and addressed our concerns patiently. We will definitely recommend her to our relatives and friends.
